name: Oasis
description: A life-giving oasis provides water, shade, and fertile soil in harsh environments, making it a crucial stopping point for travelers. However, its value makes it a target for bandits, and the limited resources can spark conflicts between competing groups.
atmosphere: Mirage made real with burst of life in harsh desert. Running water and rustling palms create soothing symphony. Shade provides sun relief. Paradise contrast with desert creates tension. Suddenly cool, humid air scented of fresh water, flowers, and rich soil.
